subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|部長|ぶちょう}}: division head
* {{ja-r|部門|ぶもん}}: [[division]], [[group]], [[branch]]
* {{ja-r|部屋|へや}}: [[room]] of a [[house]] or [[hotel]], [[chamber]], [[apartment]], [[flat]]
* {{ja-r|細%部|さい%ぶ}}: [[details]], [[minor]]
* {{ja-r|全部|ぜんぶ}}: [[everything]], [[all]]
* {{ja-r|部%活%動|ぶ%かつ%どう}}

subSections.title: Suffix
Usage notes
subSections.text: This is a level higher than {{m|ja|-課|tr=-ka||department}}, since for example {{m|ja|部長|tr=buchō||division head}} is the boss of a {{m|ja|課長|tr=kachō||department head}}.
